title: Gabbro Bowl
period: Early Dynastic Period or early Old Kingdom
description:
Deep gabbro bowl with flat base and wide mouth. 
Condition: Surface is pitted. One obvious repair in black resembling diamond shape; another break repaired with 5 staples and adhesive.
dimensions: 4 3/4 x greatest diam. 5 1/8 in. (12 x 13 cm)

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
